name: InteropIndex
desc:
'R03' = R03 - DCF option file (Adobe RGB)   
'R98' = R98 - DCF basic file (sRGB)   
'THM' = THM - DCF thumbnail file

name: SubfileType
desc:
(called NewSubfileType by the TIFF specification)   
0x0 = Full-resolution Image   
0x1 = Reduced-resolution image   
0x2 = Single page of multi-page image   
0x3 = Single page of multi-page reduced-resolution image   
0x4 = Transparency mask   
0x5 = Transparency mask of reduced-resolution image   
0x6 = Transparency mask of multi-page image   
0x7 = Transparency mask of reduced-resolution multi-page image   
0x10001 = Alternate reduced-resolution image   
0xffffffff = invalid   
Bit 0 = Reduced resolution   
Bit 1 = Single page   
Bit 2 = Transparency mask   
Bit 3 = TIFF/IT final page   
Bit 4 = TIFF-FX mixed raster content

name: OldSubfileType
desc:
(called SubfileType by the TIFF specification)   
1 = Full-resolution image   
2 = Reduced-resolution image   
3 = Single page of multi-page image

name: PhotometricInterpretation
desc:
0 = WhiteIsZero   
1 = BlackIsZero   
2 = RGB   
3 = RGB Palette   
4 = Transparency Mask   
5 = CMYK   
6 = YCbCr   
8 = CIELab   
9 = ICCLab   
10 = ITULab   
32803 = Color Filter Array   
32844 = Pixar LogL   
32845 = Pixar LogLuv   
32892 = Sequential Color Filter   
34892 = Linear Raw

name: Thresholding
desc:
1 = No dithering or halftoning   
2 = Ordered dither or halftone   
3 = Randomized dither

name:
StripOffsets   
PreviewImageStart   
PreviewImageStart   
JpgFromRawStart
desc: (called StripOffsets in most locations, but it is PreviewImageStart in IFD0 of CR2 images and various IFD's of DNG images except for SubIFD2 where it is JpgFromRawStart)

name: Orientation
desc:
1 = Horizontal (normal)   
2 = Mirror horizontal   
3 = Rotate 180   
4 = Mirror vertical   
5 = Mirror horizontal and rotate 270 CW   
6 = Rotate 90 CW   
7 = Mirror horizontal and rotate 90 CW   
8 = Rotate 270 CW

name:
StripByteCounts   
PreviewImageLength   
PreviewImageLength   
JpgFromRawLength
desc: (called StripByteCounts in most locations, but it is PreviewImageLength in IFD0 of CR2 images and various IFD's of DNG images except for SubIFD2 where it is JpgFromRawLength)

name: T4Options
desc:
Bit 0 = 2-Dimensional encoding   
Bit 1 = Uncompressed   
Bit 2 = Fill bits added

name: ResolutionUnit
desc:
(the value 1 is not standard EXIF)   
1 = None   
2 = inches   
3 = cm

name: Artist
desc: (becomes a list-type tag when the MWG module is loaded)

name:
SubIFD   
A100DataOffset
desc:
--> EXIF Tags   
(the data offset in original Sony DSLR-A100 ARW images)

name: OPIProxy
desc:
0 = Higher resolution image does not exist   
1 = Higher resolution image exists

name: FaxProfile
desc:
0 = Unknown   
1 = Minimal B&W lossless, S   
2 = Extended B&W lossless, F   
3 = Lossless JBIG B&W, J   
4 = Lossy color and grayscale, C   
5 = Lossless color and grayscale, L   
6 = Mixed raster content, M   
7 = Profile T   
255 = Multi Profiles

name: CodingMethods
desc:
Bit 0 = Unspecified compression   
Bit 1 = Modified Huffman   
Bit 2 = Modified Read   
Bit 3 = Modified MR   
Bit 4 = JBIG   
Bit 5 = Baseline JPEG   
Bit 6 = JBIG color

name:
ThumbnailOffset   
ThumbnailOffset   
ThumbnailOffset   
PreviewImageStart   
PreviewImageStart   
JpgFromRawStart   
JpgFromRawStart   
OtherImageStart   
OtherImageStart   
OtherImageStart

desc: (ThumbnailOffset in IFD1 of JPEG and some TIFF-based images, IFD0 of MRW images and AVI and MOV videos, and the SubIFD in IFD1 of SRW images; PreviewImageStart in MakerNotes and IFD0 of ARW and SR2 images; JpgFromRawStart in SubIFD of NEF images and IFD2 of PEF images; and OtherImageStart in everything else)

ThumbnailLength   
ThumbnailLength   
ThumbnailLength   
PreviewImageLength   
PreviewImageLength

SubIFD2
-
desc: (ThumbnailLength in IFD1 of JPEG and some TIFF-based images, IFD0 of MRW images and AVI and MOV videos, and the SubIFD in IFD1 of SRW images; PreviewImageLength in MakerNotes and IFD0 of ARW and SR2 images; JpgFromRawLength in SubIFD of NEF images, and IFD2 of PEF images; and OtherImageLength in everything else)

name: SonyRawFileType
desc:
0 = Sony Uncompressed 14-bit RAW   
1 = Sony Uncompressed 12-bit RAW   
2 = Sony Compressed RAW   
3 = Sony Lossless Compressed RAW

name: VignettingCorrection
desc:
(found in Sony ARW images)   
256 = Off   
257 = Auto   
511 = No correction params available

name: ChromaticAberrationCorrection
desc:
(found in Sony ARW images)   
0 = Off   
1 = Auto   
255 = No correction params available

name: DistortionCorrection
desc:
(found in Sony ARW images)   
0 = Off   
1 = Auto   
17 = Auto fixed by lens   
255 = No correction params available

name: KodakIFD
desc:
--> Kodak IFD Tags   
(used in various types of Kodak images)

name: Copyright
desc: (may contain copyright notices for photographer and editor, separated by a newline.  As per the EXIF specification, the newline is replaced by a null byte when writing to file, but this may be avoided by disabling the print conversion)

name: MDFileTag
desc: (tags 0x82a5-0x82ac are used in Molecular Dynamics GEL files)

name: RasterPadding
desc:
0 = Byte   
1 = Word   
2 = Long Word   
9 = Sector   
10 = Long Sector

name: ImageColorIndicator
desc:
0 = Unspecified Image Color   
1 = Specified Image Color

name: BackgroundColorIndicator
desc:
0 = Unspecified Background Color   
1 = Specified Background Color

name: SEMInfo
desc: (found in some scanning electron microscope images)

name: WB_GRGBLevels
desc: (found in IFD0 of Leaf MOS images)

name: TIFF_FXExtensions
desc:
Bit 0 = Resolution/Image Width   
Bit 1 = N Layer Profile M   
Bit 2 = Shared Data   
Bit 3 = B&W JBIG2   
Bit 4 = JBIG2 Profile M

name: MultiProfiles
desc:
Bit 0 = Profile S   
Bit 1 = Profile F   
Bit 2 = Profile J   
Bit 3 = Profile C   
Bit 4 = Profile L   
Bit 5 = Profile M   
Bit 6 = Profile T   
Bit 7 = Resolution/Image Width   
Bit 8 = N Layer Profile M   
Bit 9 = Shared Data   
Bit 10 = JBIG2 Profile M

name: GeoTiffDirectory
desc: (these "GeoTiff" tags may read and written as a block, but they aren't extracted unless specifically requested.  Byte order changes are handled automatically when copying between TIFF images with different byte order)

name: ExposureProgram
desc:
0 = Not Defined   
1 = Manual   
2 = Program AE   
3 = Aperture-priority AE   
4 = Shutter speed priority AE   
5 = Creative (Slow speed)   
6 = Action (High speed)   
7 = Portrait   
8 = Landscape   
9 = Bulb

name: ISO
desc: (called ISOSpeedRatings by EXIF 2.2, then PhotographicSensitivity by the EXIF 2.3 spec.)

name: TimeZoneOffset
desc: (1 or 2 values: 1. The time zone offset of DateTimeOriginal from GMT in hours, 2. If present, the time zone offset of ModifyDate)

name: SensitivityType
desc:
(applies to EXIF:ISO tag)   
0 = Unknown   
1 = Standard Output Sensitivity   
2 = Recommended Exposure Index   
3 = ISO Speed   
4 = Standard Output Sensitivity and Recommended Exposure Index   
5 = Standard Output Sensitivity and ISO Speed   
6 = Recommended Exposure Index and ISO Speed   
7 = Standard Output Sensitivity, Recommended Exposure Index and ISO Speed

name: ShutterSpeedValue
desc: (displayed in seconds, but stored as an APEX value)

name: ApertureValue
desc: (displayed as an F number, but stored as an APEX value)

name: MaxApertureValue
desc: (displayed as an F number, but stored as an APEX value)

name: MeteringMode
desc:
0 = Unknown   
1 = Average   
2 = Center-weighted average   
3 = Spot   
4 = Multi-spot   
5 = Multi-segment   
6 = Partial   
255 = Other

name: SecurityClassification
desc:
'C' = Confidential   
'R' = Restricted   
'S' = Secret   
'T' = Top Secret   
'U' = Unclassified

name: SensingMethod
desc:
1 = Monochrome area   
2 = One-chip color area   
3 = Two-chip color area   
4 = Three-chip color area   
5 = Color sequential area   
6 = Monochrome linear   
7 = Trilinear   
8 = Color sequential linear

name: AmbientTemperature
desc: (ambient temperature in degrees C, called Temperature by the EXIF spec.)

name: WaterDepth
desc: (depth under water in metres, negative for above water)

name: Acceleration
desc: (directionless camera acceleration in units of mGal, or 10-5 m/s2)

name: XPTitle
desc: (tags 0x9c9b-0x9c9f are used by Windows Explorer; special characters in these values are converted to UTF-8 by default, or Windows Latin1 with the -L option.  XPTitle is ignored by Windows Explorer if ImageDescription exists)

name: XPAuthor
desc: (ignored by Windows Explorer if Artist exists)

name: ColorSpace
desc:
(the value of 0x2 is not standard EXIF.  Instead, an Adobe RGB image is indicated by "Uncalibrated" with an InteropIndex of "R03".  The values 0xfffd and 0xfffe are also non-standard, and are used by some Sony cameras)   
0x1 = sRGB   
0x2 = Adobe RGB   
0xfffd = Wide Gamut RGB   
0xfffe = ICC Profile   
0xffff = Uncalibrated

name: FocalPlaneResolutionUnit
desc:
(values 1, 4 and 5 are not standard EXIF)   
1 = None   
2 = inches   
3 = cm   
4 = mm   
5 = um

name: SensingMethod
desc:
1 = Not defined   
2 = One-chip color area   
3 = Two-chip color area   
4 = Three-chip color area   
5 = Color sequential area   
7 = Trilinear   
8 = Color sequential linear

name: FileSource
desc:
1 = Film Scanner   
2 = Reflection Print Scanner   
3 = Digital Camera   
"\x03\x00\x00\x00" = Sigma Digital Camera

name: CustomRendered
desc:
(only 0 and 1 are standard EXIF, but other values are used by Apple iOS devices)   
0 = Normal   
1 = Custom   
3 = HDR   
6 = Panorama   
8 = Portrait

name: SceneCaptureType
desc:
(the value of 4 is non-standard, and used by some Samsung models)   
0 = Standard   
1 = Landscape   
2 = Portrait   
3 = Night   
4 = Other

name: GainControl
desc:
0 = None   
1 = Low gain up   
2 = High gain up   
3 = Low gain down   
4 = High gain down

name: LensInfo
desc: (4 rational values giving focal and aperture ranges, called LensSpecification by the EXIF spec.)

name: PixelFormat
desc:
0x5 = Black & White   
0x8 = 8-bit Gray   
0x9 = 16-bit BGR555   
0xa = 16-bit BGR565   
0xb = 16-bit Gray   
0xc = 24-bit BGR   
0xd = 24-bit RGB   
0xe = 32-bit BGR   
0xf = 32-bit BGRA   
0x10 = 32-bit PBGRA   
0x11 = 32-bit Gray Float   
0x12 = 48-bit RGB Fixed Point   
0x13 = 32-bit BGR101010   
0x15 = 48-bit RGB   
0x16 = 64-bit RGBA   
0x17 = 64-bit PRGBA   
0x18 = 96-bit RGB Fixed Point   
0x19 = 128-bit RGBA Float   
0x1a = 128-bit PRGBA Float   
0x1b = 128-bit RGB Float   
0x1c = 32-bit CMYK   
0x1d = 64-bit RGBA Fixed Point   
0x1e = 128-bit RGBA Fixed Point   
0x1f = 64-bit CMYK   
0x20 = 24-bit 3 Channels   
0x21 = 32-bit 4 Channels   
0x22 = 40-bit 5 Channels   
0x23 = 48-bit 6 Channels   
0x24 = 56-bit 7 Channels   
0x25 = 64-bit 8 Channels   
0x26 = 48-bit 3 Channels   
0x27 = 64-bit 4 Channels   
0x28 = 80-bit 5 Channels   
0x29 = 96-bit 6 Channels   
0x2a = 112-bit 7 Channels   
0x2b = 128-bit 8 Channels   
0x2c = 40-bit CMYK Alpha   
0x2d = 80-bit CMYK Alpha   
0x2e = 32-bit 3 Channels Alpha   
0x2f = 40-bit 4 Channels Alpha   
0x30 = 48-bit 5 Channels Alpha   
0x31 = 56-bit 6 Channels Alpha   
0x32 = 64-bit 7 Channels Alpha   
0x33 = 72-bit 8 Channels Alpha   
0x34 = 64-bit 3 Channels Alpha   
0x35 = 80-bit 4 Channels Alpha   
0x36 = 96-bit 5 Channels Alpha   
0x37 = 112-bit 6 Channels Alpha   
0x38 = 128-bit 7 Channels Alpha   
0x39 = 144-bit 8 Channels Alpha   
0x3a = 64-bit RGBA Half   
0x3b = 48-bit RGB Half   
0x3d = 32-bit RGBE   
0x3e = 16-bit Gray Half   
0x3f = 32-bit Gray Fixed Point

name: Transformation
desc:
0 = Horizontal (normal)   
1 = Mirror vertical   
2 = Mirror horizontal   
3 = Rotate 180   
4 = Rotate 90 CW   
5 = Mirror horizontal and rotate 90 CW   
6 = Mirror horizontal and rotate 270 CW   
7 = Rotate 270 CW

name: ImageDataDiscard
desc:
0 = Full Resolution   
1 = Flexbits Discarded   
2 = HighPass Frequency Data Discarded   
3 = Highpass and LowPass Frequency Data Discarded

name: AlphaDataDiscard
desc:
0 = Full Resolution   
1 = Flexbits Discarded   
2 = HighPass Frequency Data Discarded   
3 = Highpass and LowPass Frequency Data Discarded

name: DNGVersion
desc: (tags 0xc612-0xc7b5 are defined by the DNG specification unless otherwise noted.  See https://helpx.adobe.com/photoshop/digital-negative.html for the specification)

name: CFALayout
desc:
1 = Rectangular   
2 = Even columns offset down 1/2 row   
3 = Even columns offset up 1/2 row   
4 = Even rows offset right 1/2 column   
5 = Even rows offset left 1/2 column   
6 = Even rows offset up by 1/2 row, even columns offset left by 1/2 column   
7 = Even rows offset up by 1/2 row, even columns offset right by 1/2 column   
8 = Even rows offset down by 1/2 row, even columns offset left by 1/2 column   
9 = Even rows offset down by 1/2 row, even columns offset right by 1/2 column

name:
SR2Private   
DNGAdobeData   
MakerNotePentax   
MakerNotePentax5   
MakerNoteRicohPentax   
DNGPrivateData
group:
IFD0
IFD0
IFD0
IFD0
IFD0
IFD0
desc:
--> Sony SR2Private Tags   
--> DNG AdobeData Tags   
--> Pentax Tags   
--> Pentax Tags   
--> Pentax Tags

name: RawImageSegmentation
desc: (used in segmented Canon CR2 images.  3 numbers: 1. Number of segments minus one; 2. Pixel width of segments except last; 3. Pixel width of last segment)

name: PanasonicTitle
desc: (proprietary Panasonic tag used for baby/pet name, etc)

name: PanasonicTitle2
desc: (proprietary Panasonic tag used for baby/pet name with age)

name: ProfileEmbedPolicy
desc:
0 = Allow Copying   
1 = Embed if Used   
2 = Never Embed   
3 = No Restrictions

name: PreviewColorSpace
desc:
0 = Unknown   
1 = Gray Gamma 2.2   
2 = sRGB   
3 = Adobe RGB   
4 = ProPhoto RGB

name: OwnerName
desc: (tags 0xfde8-0xfdea and 0xfe4c-0xfe58 are generated by Photoshop Camera RAW. Some names are the same as other EXIF tags, but ExifTool will avoid writing these unless they already exist in the file)

name: KDC_IFD
desc:
--> Kodak KDC_IFD Tags   
(used in some Kodak KDC images)
